testcase.classname: US037 recharge - offline - index tests / Administrator should be able to view balance changes made offline
testcase.name: TC_3702 It should be verified that transactions are listed according to information in the Offline Recharge List
testcase.system-out: Given Open browser go to url "AdminUrl".....................................passed Then Admin enters an "email", a "password" and then clicks sign in link on admin page to login.passed Then Admin clicks Wallet Manage link........................................passed Then Admin clicks Offline Recharge link.....................................passed Then Admin verifies that transactions are listed according to SL information in the Offline Recharge List.passed Then Admin verifies that transactions are listed according to Date information in the Offline Recharge List.passed Then Admin verifies that transactions are listed according to Email information in the Offline Recharge List.passed Then Admin verifies that transactions are listed according to TXN ID information in the Offline Recharge List.passed Then Admin verifies that transactions are listed according to Amount information in the Offline Recharge List.passed Then Admin verifies that transactions are listed according to Type information in the Offline Recharge List.passed Then Admin verifies that transactions are listed according to Payment Method information in the Offline Recharge List.passed Then Admin verifies that transactions are listed according to Approval information in the Offline Recharge List.passed Then Admin verifies that transactions are listed according to Action information in the Offline Recharge List.passed And Closes the page.........................................................passed
